content.rendered:
REAL NASHVILLE

WEDDINGS

REAL NASHVILLE

WEDDINGS

Kristen + Guido’s Romantic Flower-Filled Wedding

A flower-filled wedding reception full of romance at The Bell Tower.

Megan + Jorge’s Modern Mexican-American Wedding

A modern Mexican-American wedding at The Estate at Cherokee Dock.

Carley + Turner’s Modern Yet Timeless Wedding

A modern yet classic wedding with bold florals at The Bell Tower.

Whitney + Carson’s Timeless Black and White Wedding

A timeless wedding with a modern black and white design at The Bell Tower.

Deysi + Michael’s Enchanted Garden Wedding

An enchanted indoor garden wedding ceremony and reception at the Estate at Cherokee Dock.

Sarah + Richard’s Black and White Wedding

A black and white wedding ceremony and reception at the Estate of Cherokee Dock with trending design.

Ali + Tyler’s Moody Eclectic Wedding

Take a look at this moody wedding ceremony and reception with eclectic design at the Bell Tower.

Emmy + Mike’s Eclectic Festival-inspired Wedding

A boho disco wedding ceremony and reception full of the color at the Bridge Building.

Amanda + Channing’s Elegant August Wedding

An elegant August wedding with draping and a string lit ambiance at The Bell Tower.

Gage + Brian’s Romantic Garden-Inspired Wedding

A romantic wedding ceremony and reception with garden-inspired decor at the Bridge Building.

Alexa + Conor’s Romantic June Wedding

A romantic and modern June wedding with neutral decor and bright flower arrangements at The Bell Tower.

Mackenzie + Jack’s Tropical Summer Wedding

A summer wedding with disco ball decor, tropical leaves, and pops of navy blue at The Cordelle.

Gray + Trent’s Romantic Retro Wedding

A romantic and retro Nashville wedding with red and pink decor at The Bell Tower.

Tala + Vagif’s Classic Neutral Wedding

An intimate outdoor wedding ceremony and neutral classic reception at the Estate at Cherokee Dock.

Emily + Tyler’s Whimsical Wisteria Wedding

A spring wedding ceremony and reception with whimsical wisteria at the Bridge Building.

Alexis + Zach’s Modern Neutral Wedding

A modern and neutral Downtown Nashville wedding at the Bridge Building.

Kristen + Vincent’s Modern Classic Wedding

A classic, modern Nashville wedding with boho floral arrangements at The Bell Tower.

Hannah + Justin’s Remarkably Romantic Wedding

An ultra romantic wedding ceremony and reception with a classic design at the Bell Tower.

Amiyah + Kaleb’s Floral-Filled Spring Wedding

A floral-filled spring wedding with classic details at The Bell Tower.

Mindy + Gary’s Red Winter Wedding

A winter wedding ceremony and reception with burgundy red details at the Bridge Building.

Abigail + Jacob’s Classic White Wedding

A summer wedding ceremony and reception full of classic white decor at Cherokee Dock.

Sarah + Joseph’s Dreamy Indoor Garden Wedding

A spring wedding ceremony and reception with indoor garden inspiration at the Bridge Building.

Meg + Will’s Classic Winter Wedding

A classic winter wedding with white and champagne details at The Bell Tower.

Madding + Brooks’ Elegant New Year’s Wedding

An elegant winter wedding ceremony and reception going into the New Year.

LOAD MORE

excerpt.rendered: Madding and Brooks celebrated their marriage with an elegant wedding day starting at the First Presbyterian Church in Nashville and ending at The Bell Tower, which was filled with refined style, lots of florals, and New Year’s celebrations! Both Madding and Brooks went to the University of Auburn but didn’t meet until attending a mutual […]
